name: Drive Of Alpha 0.1
description:
Drive of is an endless 2d car driving game where you have to control the car and avoid the other cars.

This game is currently in alpha state so there might be a lot of bugs in this game, If you
find any bug then email at G2PStudios.help@outlook.com

Credits:

Assets by : Buildbox.com

Music by : Adil_Dev

SFX by : zapsplat.com and EpidemicSound.com

System Requirements:

Windows Pc (Any)

Ram (2 or 4 gb recommended)

Hard Disk Space 60mb (only)

Thanks for trying this game, We hope that you will enjoy this game.
